item.title: FreeDi v2.00
item.description:
## ‚ö†Ô∏è Heads-up: Upgrading FreeDi from **v1.x ‚ûú v2.00**
A quick notice before the v2.00 release drops later today:
### Why this notice? Moving from the 1.x line to **v2.00** brings a completely new software base (Armbian 25, Klipper 0.13, fresh screen firmwares, reworked configs, the Wizard, and much more ‚Ä¶). Although I‚Äôve run several upgrade tests successfully, I **cannot guarantee** a flawless transition on every device. This major release can cause problems on a normal update.
### üîí Please back ...
